message:
What is the best technical session you saw? I'm talking about all sides: the materials, the speaker, the slides, video quality, fun, etc.

Please post links to the sessions, and specify what you liked most about it.

data.message: Any session for Scott Hanselman: The humorous, laid-back way of speaking/presenting ideas

Rob Conery: https://vimeo.com/43548699 The first time I watch a complete session without a single word spoken.. :D I generally likes Rob's way of presenting stuff and the way he lay stuff (specially in introductory level sessions)
